title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. On motif platforms, the text fields in the Info page of the Project Properties dialog have automatic borders which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out much worse.
OB: On Windows, the Info page of the Project Properties dialog appears fine. However, on motif platforms, the text fields in this page have automatic borders, indicating that they are user input targets. Moreover, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out even more.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project and right click to open the context menu. Click on Properties and navigate to the Info page. Notice that the read-only fields (such as Path, Type, etc.)
